sourceMeaningMnemonic: You place a <radical>cross</radical> on this <radical>drunkard</radical>'s <radical>clothes</radical> to show him you <kanji>judge</kanji> him. In fact, you yell, "I JUDGE YOU FOR BEING DRUNK AND WEARING THESE CLOTHES, TAKE THIS!"
meaningInfo: He yells back, "YOU CAN'T JUDGE ME, I CAN DO WHAT I WANT. GET THAT JUDGEY CROSS OFF ME!"
readingMnemonic: As you <kanji>judge</kanji> each other, your <reading>cy</reading>borg (<ja>さい</ja>) comes stomping over and slams the drunkard against the wall. With your trusty cyborg coming to your rescue, you can continue to judge this guy all you want.
readingInfo: The cyborg joins in, "A judge would convict you if the fashion police brought you in. I have a bunch of meat and robot parts and even I'm better looking than you."
